requs-maven-plugin

requs-maven-plugin
Parent Project
  • requs
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

requs:default

Note:This goal should be used as a Maven report.

Full name:

org.requs:requs-maven-plugin:1.14.1:default

Description:

Generate site reports.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 1.1.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
output File 1.1 Output directory.
User property is: project.reporting.outputDirectory.
source File 1.1 The source directory.
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/main/requs.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
options Map 1.14 Optional properties/options.

Parameter Details

options:

Optional properties/options.
  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Since: 1.14
  • Required: No

output:

Output directory.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.1
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: project.reporting.outputDirectory

source:

The source directory.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1.1
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/main/requs
